column4: Is there any way to reduce or eliminate lag in online flash apps or is it a known issue?
as far as i know, no, because i think hardware acceleration simply doesnt work in loinux flash for soom reason
Ok, so it's a common issue and not something I installed wrong?  Because my GFX driver is working fine - games in WINE have no lag...but for some reason small flash games will lag pretty badly.
yeah its a flash player bug
